section.name: datetime
section.title: Date and time manipulation
section.description: These functions all manipulate dates and times in various ways. The functions can be used to create calendars, set timestamps for publications and so forth. Please note that these functions are not suited for historic calculations, using dates that predate the introduction of the Gregorian Calendar.
